author: Reuters Editorial
title: Nigeria to delay electricity tariff hike amid coronavirus lockdowns
description: Nigeria will postpone by at least three months planned electricity tariff increases as its citizens struggle with coronavirus lockdowns, the Minister of Power said on Tuesday.
content:
LAGOS, March 31 (Reuters) - Nigeria will postpone by at least three months planned electricity tariff increases as its citizens struggle with coronavirus lockdowns, the Minister of Power said on Tuesday. 
The first price increase since 2015, which was schedu… [+1712 chars]
